quote: You see things and say ‘Why?’, but I dream things and say ‘Why not?’
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.’
author: Walt Disney

quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10.000 ways that won’t work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Miracles happen to those who believe in them.
author: Bernhard Berenson

quote: A man is happy so long as he chooses to be happy.
author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you’ve imagined.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: May the most you wish for be the least you get.
author: Irish toast

quote: Great works are performed, not by strength, but by perseverance
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration, and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Twenty years from now, you’ll be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts; to believe in the heroic makes heroes.
author: Benjamin Disrael

quote: May you live all the days of your life!
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: I prefer the folly of enthusiasm to the wisdom of indifference.
author: Oscar Wilde
